game.title: The Final Fantasy
game.synopsis: A young boy named Cloud Strife, and his friends, set out to stop a madman from using the power of the planet to destroy the world.
game.beginning: Cloud Strife, a young man from the town of Nibelheim, is recruited by Shinra, a company that harnesses the power of the planet, to join their elite group of mercenaries, SOLDIER.
game.ending: Cloud Strife, a young man from Nibelheim, is recruited by Shinra, a powerful corporation that harnesses the energy of the planet, to join their elite military force, SOLDIER. After he is recruited, Cloud and his friends, Tifa, Aerith, and Barret, are sent to investigate a strange monster attacking Midgar. However, they soon uncover a much darker plot by Shinra, which threatens the very existence of the planet.
